languages.text: "Безусловно". {n}Зауэрбэк отвечает без промедления.{/n} "У губернатора Драйвстема есть доказательства вины, а у них — ни единого способа их опровергнуть. Даже если допустить мысль, что кто-то подставил Версериан, то сколь долго они протянули бы еще, не будучи готовыми к предательству?" {n}Махарий обращается к Абеляру с легкой усмешкой в голосе.{/n} "Думаю, сейчас тот случай, когда им лучше не обращаться за помощью Вольного Торговца, а остановиться, принять судьбу и не ухудшать собственное положение".

traits.locale_text: "Безусловно". {n}Зауэрбек отвечает без промедления.{/n} "У губернатора Драйвстема есть доказательства вины рода Версериан, а у них — ни единого способа их опровергнуть. Даже если допустить мысль, что кто-то подставил Версериан, то сколь долго они протянули бы еще, не будучи готовыми к предательству?" {n}Махарий обращается к Абеляру с легкой усмешкой в голосе.{/n} "Думаю, сейчас тот случай, когда им лучше не обращаться за помощью Вольного Торговца, а остановиться, принять судьбу и не ухудшать собственное положение".
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: "Certainly," {n}Sauerback replies without hesitation.{/n} "Governor Drivestem possesses proof of their guilt and they have no means by which to refute it. Even if I were to entertain the idea that the Werserians are being framed, how much longer would their house have lasted anyway, if it is so ill-prepared for treachery?" {n}He addresses Abelard with a slightly mocking tone.{/n} "My advice to House Werserian would be not to appeal to the Rogue Trader for help, but instead to simply stop, accept their fate, and not make matters worse for themselves."
languages.original_text: "Безусловно". {n}Зауэрбэк отвечает без промедления.{/n} "У губернатора Драйвстема есть доказательства вины, а у них — ни единого способа их опровергнуть. Даже если допустить мысль, что кто-то подставил Версериан, то сколь долго они протянули бы еще, не будучи готовыми к предательству?" {n}Махарий обращается к Абеляру с легкой усмешкой в голосе.{/n} "Думаю, сейчас тот случай, когда им лучше не обращаться за помощью Вольного Торговца, а остановиться, принять судьбу и не ухудшать собственное положение".

traits.locale_text: "Certainly." {n}Saureback replies without hesitation.{/n} "Governor Drivestem has the incriminating evidence and they do not have a single way to refute them. Even if entertain the idea of the Werserians being framed, then for how long would have they lasted, not being prepared for a betrayal?" {n}Macharias addresses Abelard with a slightly mocking voice.{/n} "I think that this is the case when it would be better not to ask the Rogue Trader for help, but rather just stop, accept their fate and try to not make the matters worse for themselves."
traits.speaker: Zaurback

traits.locale_text: "Certainly." {n}Saureback replies without hesitation.{/n} "Governor Drivestem has the incriminating evidence and they do not have a single way to refute them. Even if entertain the idea of the Werserians being framed, then for how long would have they lasted, not being prepared for a betrayal?" {n}Macharias addresses Abelard with a slightly mocking voice.{/n} "I think that this is the case when it would be better not to ask the Rogue Trader for help, but rather just stop, accept their fate and try to not make the matters worse for themselves."
traits.speaker: Zaurback

Even if I were to entertain the idea that the Werserians are being framed, how much longer would their house have lasted anyway, if it is so ill-prepared for treachery?" {n}He addresses Abelard with a slightly mocking tone.{/n} "My advice to House Werserian would be not to appeal to the Rogue Trader for help, but instead to simply stop, accept their fate, and not make matters worse for themselves."
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: 「間違いありません」{n}ザウアーバックは、ためらうことなく答える。{/n}「ドライブステム総督が有罪を示す証拠を持っていますし、ウェルザリアン家には反論材料がありません。ウェルザリアン家が濡れ衣を着せられたという考えを認めるとしても、裏切りに対する備えがこれほどに不十分では、その家系もいつまでもつことでしょうな？」{n}マハリウスはわずかなあざけりを含んだ声でアベラルドに話しかける。{/n}「ウェルザリアン家へ忠告することがあるとすれば、自由開拓者に助けを求めるのは、やめておくことだ。おとなしく抵抗を止めて、己の運命を受け入れろ。これ以上、自分たちの立場を悪くするな」
languages.original_text: "Certainly," {n}Sauerback replies without hesitation.{/n} "Governor Drivestem possesses proof of their guilt and they have no means by which to refute it. Even if I were to entertain the idea that the Werserians are being framed, how much longer would their house have lasted anyway, if it is so ill-prepared for treachery?" {n}He addresses Abelard with a slightly mocking tone.{/n} "My advice to House Werserian would be not to appeal to the Rogue Trader for help, but instead to simply stop, accept their fate, and not make matters worse for themselves."

traits.locale_text: 「間違いありません」{n}ザウアーバックは、ためらうことなく答える。{/n}「ドライブステム総督が有罪を示す証拠を持っていますし、ウェルザリアン家には反論材料がありません。ウェルザリアン家が濡れ衣を着せられたという考えを認めるとしても、裏切りに対する備えがこれほどに不十分では、その家系もいつまでもつことでしょうな？」{n}マハリウスはわずかなあざけりを含んだ声でアベラルドに話しかける。{/n}「ウェルザリアン家へ忠告することがあるとすれば、自由開拓者に助けを求めるのは、やめておくことだ。おとなしく抵抗を止めて、己の運命を受け入れろ。これ以上、自分たちの立場を悪くするな」
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: “当然。”{n}苏尔贝克毫不犹豫地回答道。{/n}“德莱夫斯塔总督出示了罪行确凿的证据，而韦尔森家族无法反驳。即便我愿意相信韦尔森家族真的遭到了陷害，可如果他们在背叛行为面前如此不堪一击，他们的家族又能坚持多久？”{n}马卡里乌斯以略带嘲讽的口吻对阿贝拉德说道。{/n}“我认为，韦尔森家族当下之计不是寻求行商浪人的协助，而是停止无谓的抵抗，接受命运的安排，不要把事情变得更加难堪。”
languages.original_text: "Certainly," {n}Sauerback replies without hesitation.{/n} "Governor Drivestem possesses proof of their guilt and they have no means by which to refute it. Even if I were to entertain the idea that the Werserians are being framed, how much longer would their house have lasted anyway, if it is so ill-prepared for treachery?" {n}He addresses Abelard with a slightly mocking tone.{/n} "My advice to House Werserian would be not to appeal to the Rogue Trader for help, but instead to simply stop, accept their fate, and not make matters worse for themselves."

traits.locale_text: “当然。”{n}苏尔贝克毫不犹豫地回答道。{/n}“德莱夫斯塔总督出示了罪行确凿的证据，而韦尔森家族无法反驳。即便我愿意相信韦尔森家族真的遭到了陷害，可如果他们在背叛行为面前如此不堪一击，他们的家族又能坚持多久？”{n}马卡里乌斯以略带嘲讽的口吻对阿贝拉德说道。{/n}“我认为，韦尔森家族当下之计不是寻求行商浪人的协助，而是停止无谓的抵抗，接受命运的安排，不要把事情变得更加难堪。”
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: « Cela ne fait aucun doute, {n}répond Sauerback sans la moindre trace d'hésitation.{/n} Le gouverneur Drivestem possède des preuves formelles de leur culpabilité et ils n'ont aucun moyen de les réfuter. Quand bien même seraient-ils victimes d'un coup monté, leur maison était condamnée d'avance pour ne s'être pas préparée à une telle éventualité. » {n}Il s'adresse alors à Abélard sur un ton moqueur :{/n} « À leur place, j'éviterais d'importuner {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} et j'accepterais tout simplement mon sort plutôt que de risquer d'aggraver mon cas. »
languages.original_text: "Certainly," {n}Sauerback replies without hesitation.{/n} "Governor Drivestem possesses proof of their guilt and they have no means by which to refute it. Even if I were to entertain the idea that the Werserians are being framed, how much longer would their house have lasted anyway, if it is so ill-prepared for treachery?" {n}He addresses Abelard with a slightly mocking tone.{/n} "My advice to House Werserian would be not to appeal to the Rogue Trader for help, but instead to simply stop, accept their fate, and not make matters worse for themselves."

traits.locale_text: « Cela ne fait aucun doute, {n}répond Sauerback sans la moindre trace d'hésitation.{/n} Le gouverneur Drivestem possède des preuves formelles de leur culpabilité et ils n'ont aucun moyen de les réfuter. Quand bien même seraient-ils victimes d'un coup monté, leur maison était condamnée d'avance pour ne s'être pas préparée à une telle éventualité. » {n}Il s'adresse alors à Abélard sur un ton moqueur :{/n} « À leur place, j'éviterais d'importuner {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} et j'accepterais tout simplement mon sort plutôt que de risquer d'aggraver mon cas. »
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: «Sin duda». {n}Sauerback responde al instante.{/n} «El gobernador Drivestem tiene pruebas de su culpabilidad y carecen de los medios necesarios para refutarlas. Aunque estuviera dispuesto a contemplar la posibilidad de que se trate de una encerrona, ¿cuánto cree que duraría la casa si está tan poco preparada para una traición?». {n}Se dirige a Abelard con un tono ligeramente burlón.{/n} «Le daré un consejo a la casa Werserian: no acudan a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente en busca de ayuda. Déjenlo, acepten su destino y no empeoren aún más las cosas».
languages.original_text: "Certainly," {n}Sauerback replies without hesitation.{/n} "Governor Drivestem possesses proof of their guilt and they have no means by which to refute it. Even if I were to entertain the idea that the Werserians are being framed, how much longer would their house have lasted anyway, if it is so ill-prepared for treachery?" {n}He addresses Abelard with a slightly mocking tone.{/n} "My advice to House Werserian would be not to appeal to the Rogue Trader for help, but instead to simply stop, accept their fate, and not make matters worse for themselves."

traits.locale_text: «Sin duda». {n}Sauerback responde al instante.{/n} «El gobernador Drivestem tiene pruebas de su culpabilidad y carecen de los medios necesarios para refutarlas. Aunque estuviera dispuesto a contemplar la posibilidad de que se trate de una encerrona, ¿cuánto cree que duraría la casa si está tan poco preparada para una traición?». {n}Se dirige a Abelard con un tono ligeramente burlón.{/n} «Le daré un consejo a la casa Werserian: no acudan a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente en busca de ayuda. Déjenlo, acepten su destino y no empeoren aún más las cosas».
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: "Sicher", {n}antwortet Sauerback ohne zu zögern.{/n} "Gouverneur Drivestem liegen Beweise für ihre Schuld vor und sie haben keine Möglichkeit, diese zu entkräften. So sehr mir die Vorstellung auch gefällt, dass die Werserians verleumdet werden, wie lange hätte ihr Haus wohl noch bestanden, wenn sie auf Verrat derart schlecht vorbereitet sind?" {n}Seine Worte sind mit einem spöttischen Unterton an Abelard gerichtet.{/n} "Ich würde Haus Werserian empfehlen, nicht {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} um Hilfe zu bitten, sondern ihr Schicksal einfach zu akzeptieren, um alles nicht noch schlimmer zu machen."
languages.original_text: "Certainly," {n}Sauerback replies without hesitation.{/n} "Governor Drivestem possesses proof of their guilt and they have no means by which to refute it. Even if I were to entertain the idea that the Werserians are being framed, how much longer would their house have lasted anyway, if it is so ill-prepared for treachery?" {n}He addresses Abelard with a slightly mocking tone.{/n} "My advice to House Werserian would be not to appeal to the Rogue Trader for help, but instead to simply stop, accept their fate, and not make matters worse for themselves."

traits.locale_text: "Gewiss." {n}Sauerbacks Antwort kommt ohne jedes Zögern.{/n} "Gouverneur Drivestem hat die belastenden Beweise, und sie haben kein einziges Argument, um sie zu widerlegen. Selbst, wenn ich dem Gedanken Glauben schenke, dass jemand das den Werserians anhängen will ... Wie länge hätten sie wohl durchgehalten, ohne auf einen Verrat vorbereitet zu sein?" {n}Macharius spricht Abelard mit leicht spöttischer Stimme an.{/n} "Es wäre wohl besser, {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} nicht um Hilfe zu bitten, sondern einfach aufzugeben, ihr Schicksal zu akzeptieren und zu versuchen, nicht noch alles schlimmer zu machen."
traits.speaker: Zaurback

languages.text: "Tabii ki." {n}Sauerback, tereddüt etmeden yanıtlıyor.{/n} "Vali Drivestem'in elinde çürütemedikleri bir delil mevcut. Werserianların tezgâha düşürüldüğünü varsaysak dahi ihanete karşı böyle hazırlıksızken daha ne kadar dayanacaklardı ki?" {n}Hafif alaylı bir tonla Abelard'a hitap ediyor.{/n} "Werserian Hanesi'ne tavsiyem, Hür Tacir'den yardım istemek yerine kaderlerini kabullenip vaziyeti kendileri için daha da vahim hâle getirmemeleri yönünde olacaktır."
languages.original_text: "Certainly," {n}Sauerback replies without hesitation.{/n} "Governor Drivestem possesses proof of their guilt and they have no means by which to refute it. Even if I were to entertain the idea that the Werserians are being framed, how much longer would their house have lasted anyway, if it is so ill-prepared for treachery?" {n}He addresses Abelard with a slightly mocking tone.{/n} "My advice to House Werserian would be not to appeal to the Rogue Trader for help, but instead to simply stop, accept their fate, and not make matters worse for themselves."

traits.locale_text: "Tabii ki." {n}Sauerback tereddüt etmeden yanıtlıyor.{/n} "Vali Drivestem'in elinde çürütemedikleri bir delil mevcut. Werserian tarafının tezgâha düşürüldüğünü varsaysak dahi ihanete karşı böyle hazırlıksızken daha ne kadar dayanacaklardı ki?" {n}Hafif alaylı bir tonda Abelard'a hitap ediyor.{/n} "Werserian Hanesi'ne tavsiyem, Hür Tacir'den yardım istemek yerine kaderlerini kabullenip vaziyeti kendileri için daha da vahim hâle getirmemeleri yönünde olacaktır."
traits.speaker: Zaurback
